column5: Ontario Travellers:Anyone wanting information on the condition and/or construction activity on Ontario highways, take a look at the Ontario Ministry of Transportation web site:http://www.mto.gov.on.ca/english/index.htmlScroll down the right side of the page to "Traveller's Information". You can look up ongoing construction or you can look at the official Ontario Road Map (you can zoom in to get as much detail as you require).Jay
